text: Casual Acquaintances is a compilation album by American rock band The Growlers. The album was released on July 27, 2018 through Beach Goth Records. It contains out-take and B-sides from their fifth studio album, City Club. == Track listing == == Who Loves the Scum – Single == A single released not long after the album, most likely a demo along with its b-side from the same sessions as Casual Acquaintances. == References == == External links == * Category:2018 compilation albums Category:The Growlers albums
title: Casual Acquaintances
